Question: According to Diogenes Laertius, this person initially visited Syracuse while it was under the rule of Dionysius.
Hints: The Oxford Classical Texts offers the current standard complete Greek text of this person's complete works.
Many papyri which contain fragments of this person's texts are among the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
One tradition regarding the arrangement of this person's texts is according to tetralogies.
